codechain.content: blockchain platform tailored to support legal requirements and privacy for the next generation digital securities

legal.title: Legal compliance
legal.content:
Token-level built-in
support for regulatory
compliant issuance and
transactions (KYC/AML)

asset.title: Programmable assets
asset.content:
Instant dividend or interest
payouts, buybacks, voting,
asset composition/
decomposition/recomposition

liquidity.title: Increased liquidity
liquidity.content:
Native support for
algorithm- based
autonomous liquidity
reserve mechanism

public.title: Public blockchain
public.content:
Blockchain offers decentralized,
secure, transparent, and
immutable transactions

privacy.title: Privacy protection
privacy.content:
Chain-level control
over privacy for
assets and owners
